saltlakehikes.location: Salt Lake City, Salt Lake County, UT
saltlakehikes.description: A medium difficulty hike with many rocks and great views of the Salt Lake Valley.

saltlakehikes.location: North Salt Lake, Salt Lake County, UT
saltlakehikes.description: This easy hike offers views of Salt Lake City and the City Creek area.
This hike is easy but is steep with many stairs to the small creek and waterfall at the top.

saltlakehikes.hikeName: Bear Canyon Bridge via Bonneville Shoreline Trail
saltlakehikes.description: This medium difficulty hike includes a bridge and access to the Bonneville Shoreline Trail and Bear Canyon Loop.
This medium difficulty hike features a waterfall and scenic views.
